snippet: With dozens of cases pending in the United States, and the Supreme Court expected to take up the issue directly, opponents still see a chance to prevail.
abstract: Leading opponents of same-sex marriage vow to push ahead with their legal fight, noting that several federal appeals courts have not yet ruled on issue and that Supreme Court may still decide to leave it up to the states; opponents are heartened by Justice Anthony M Kennedy’s order to temporarily block federal appeals court ruling striking down marriage restrictions in Idaho.
lead_paragraph: With dozens of cases pending in the United States, and the Supreme Court expected to take up the issue directly, opponents still see a chance to prevail.

headline.main: Gay Marriage Opponents Set to Continue Court Battle
headline.print_headline: Gay Marriage Opponents Set to Continue Court Battle

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
